text: No Highway in the Sky is a 1951 British American psychological drama movie directed by Henry Koster and based on the 1948 novel No Highway by Nevil Shute. It stars James Stewart, Marlene Dietrich, Glynis Johns, Jack Hawkins, Ronald Squire, Kenneth More, Felix Aylmer, Bessie Love and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1950s psychological movies Category:1951 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Henry Koster Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Canada
title: No Highway in the Sky
